author: gregthegreek
content:
Would it make sense to add labels to PRs so people can sort through them better, for example:
- `Status Change`: PR that only changes the status
- `New EIP`: PR for adding a new file under `./eips`
- `Update EIP`: PR for updating the contents of an EIP, not meant for status changes

author: sky.cactus
content: I use my email inbox feed to process EIPs.  If other editors use the GitHub UI then labels may help them more than me (and thus they should answer).

author: lightclient
content: PR labels would be cool - maybe sometime the eip bot can do

author: gcolvin
content: I'll note that update EIPs are often pretty uninteresting, especially for Drafts -- typos, grammar and such.
